name: Fond Ferdinand: The Spiral Path
description:
Steps like nautilus. 4 landings, 3 coco carvings, 5 pandanus.

Riddle: "Follow the shell's mathematics."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Steps like nautilus. 4 landings, 3 coco carvings, 5 pandanus.. spiral_path_mathematical_nature with geometric_natural_spiral_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_pandanus_midground_carvings_foreground_steps. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: nautilus_patterns, carved_coco_motifs. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: Steps like nautilus. 4 landings, 3 coco carvings, 5 pandanus.

props.name: coco_carvings
props.description: Carved coco de mer in stone
